Articles.Content:
Hey, I bought  this game a while ago and I can't understand what is happening. I can install every mod except the mods that modify or add textures like KSPRC.

I know KSPRC is way outdated so I install everything itself. Not one single thing works. I'm on 1.2.2 and it does load the stuff but I never get clouds or shining on my rockets. I drag everything to the GameData folder and I installed ModuleManager too. Though not even the most mods I want need it. I hope you can help me, thanks!
